name: AR System
shortDescription:
[In Progress]
Developed for the University of Wollongong Hong Kong Campus
For replacing the internal Excel Visual Basic programs

  • For internal use within the school office
  • Import data sources from csv files
  • Generate up to 10 different types of reports
  • in PDF(.pdf) or Excel(.xlsx) format, or zipped (.zip)
  • Huge performamnce improvement comparing to Excel Visual Basic
    Time of generating the same set of reports
  • Before: Up to a day
  • After: Within 10 seconds
longDescription:
[In Progress]
Developed for the University of Wollongong Hong Kong Campus
For replacing the internal Excel Visual Basic programs

  • For internal use within the school office
  • Import data sources from csv files
  • Generate up to 10 different types of reports
  • in PDF(.pdf) or Excel(.xlsx) format, or zipped (.zip)
  • Huge performamnce improvement comparing to Excel Visual Basic
    Time of generating the same set of reports
  • Before: Up to a day
  • After: Within 10 seconds

name: ORCAS Platform
shortDescription:
Developed for the University of Wollongong Hong Kong Campus
Hosted on https://orcas.uowchk.edu.hk
Alternative URL https://orcas.johnnyip.com

  • Students upload resources with description and URL
  • Can be a article, a thesis or a video

  • School staff edit and approve the information of resources.
  • The resources will be displayed on the website publicly
  • Other students can search resources by keywords and filters
longDescription:
Developed for the University of Wollongong Hong Kong Campus
Hosted on https://orcas.uowchk.edu.hk
Alternative URL https://orcas.johnnyip.com

The design and frontend (HTML, CSS): Done by summer interns (I am the instructor)

Other parts include frontend Js (React.js), backend Spring Boot (Hibernate, Spring Security, JWT) are done by me.

Main functionality

  • Students upload resources with description and URL
  • Can be a article, a thesis or a video

  • School staff edit and approve the information of resources.
  • The resources will be displayed on the website publicly
  • Other students can search resources by keywords and filters

name: Introduction to Cryptocurrency (5:04)
shortDescription:
Participated in a Knowledge Enhancement Series by UOWCHK Student Learning Support Scheme.

I am the script writer and the presenter of the video.
In the video, I have introduced some basic knowledge about cryptocurreny (Bitcoin), including the blockchain, usage of Bitcoin, and their Pros and Cons.
longDescription:
Participated in a Knowledge Enhancement Series by UOWCHK Student Learning Support Scheme.

I am the script writer and the presenter of the video.
In the video, I have introduced some basic knowledge about cryptocurreny (Bitcoin), including the blockchain, usage of Bitcoin, and their Pros and Cons.

name: Supply Chain Finance Operation Platform
shortDescription:
[FYP] A system for stakeholders in supplychain finance

  • Delivery Order Management
  • Delivery checkpoints - Map View
  • Documents Storage
  • Synchronize Data To Private Blockchain
longDescription:
[FYP]
A system for stakeholders involved in the Supply Chain Finance (Supplier, distributor, driver)
They can manage and closely monitor the delivery status, and synchronize all the data to a private blockchain network.

Tech Stack

FrontendReact.js
Hosted using Docker

Libraries used:
  • Redux-toolkit (State Container)
  • Mantine (UI Components)
  • Next.js (Server-side Rendering)
  • Tabler (Icons)
  • Axios (HTTP requests)
Backend (Operation Centre)Spring Boot
Connected to MySQL
Hosted using Tomcat

  • Spring Security (JWT)
  • Spring Data JPA
  • Hosted with Tomcat
Backend (Blockchain Centre)Hyperledger Fabric
  • A Single-node Linux
  • Running Docker Containers

Perform Read and Insert operations with an API endpoint
  • Hyperledger Fabric Gateway SDK
  • Spring Boot Application
  • Hosted with Tomcat

DatabaseMySQL
File StorageAWS S3 bucket (Pre-signed URL)
CI/CDJenkins

name: Tour Booking System
shortDescription:
[School Project]

  • Host Create Tours
  • Tourists Join Tours
  • Admin Approve the Application of Host Users
  • Handle Complaints and Chat Between Users
longDescription:
[School Project]
A system for people to apply and become a local tour host and host tours.
Also allow foreign tourists join those tours.


Tech Stack

Frontend + Backend
  • Spring Boot
  • Spring Security
  • Thymeleaf (HTML+js)
  • Spring Data JPA
Web ServerTomcat
DatabaseMySQL
File StorageAWS S3 bucket (Pre-signed URL)
CI/CDJenkins
